PageTitle: display bgp ipv6 routing-table statistics best
FuncDef: The display bgp ipv6 routing-table statistics best command displays the statistics of optimal and Best External routes.
CLIs: display bgp ipv6 routing-table statistics best
Examples: <HUAWEI> display bgp ipv6 routing-table statistics best
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display bgp ipv6 routing-table statistics best command displays the statistics of optimal and Best External routes.
Precautions
If a routing loop occurs, some routes may have not converged when you run the display bgp ipv6 routing-table statistics command. Therefore, the route statistics displayed using the command may be different from the actual number.
